Text:
I hope all the people out there respect what this man does.. 

Hats off to you man.. I know what a pain in the ass ripping and uploading is.. I have recommended you to a lot of people i know and they are very happy with it..I'm saying thank you on their behalf.

One of my friends was asking if you could do how i met your mother the previous seasons.. I wasn't astonished as they asked it from you, even if i was one of them i would have done the same. 

Anyway take care, I hope your mom and your dog is doing good. :)

Thanks for your great work.

@dark_defender: Sunday morning gave me opportunity to check for your both requests... and glass is half full... not half empty.

So, Sophie's choice never was released on BluRay disk nor aired in HDTV (both preferred). For worse, out there there is no DVD too, just 2CD rip, small frame (592x320) but fairly big (1.37 GB) due to the duration of the movie.

My encode is 624x352 - smaller than you asked for - but 700 MB. I cannot do a new encode (re-rip) 'cause, as I said, DVD cannot be found.
I would put this encode in one future movie.pack anyway, and you could download it - or not. It's up to you.

A Perfect World cause no problems at all.
